description:
Denver – New Licences Only

In this provision the ‘Combined Flow’ shall mean the sum of the flows of water in the Ely Ouse River and the Cut-Off Channel as measured by the Agency at the Denver Complex at National Grid Reference TF 58807 00990.

Main River (in South Level)

No water shall be abstracted from the [location] when the Licence Holder has been notified by the Agency in writing that the combined flow is EQUAL to or LESS than 12 cubic metres per second.
